H0.text: what team does mike fisher play for. Ottawa Senators

H1.text: what team does mike fisher play for. Toronto Maple Leafs

H2.text: what team does mike fisher play for. Detroit Red Wings

H3.text: what team does mike fisher play for. Nashville Predators

A4.text: Fisher was drafted by the Senators in the second round, 44th overall, in the 1998 NHL Entry Draft.

A5.text: On February 10, 2011, Fisher was traded to the Nashville Predators.

A6.text: On September 7, 2016, the Predators announced Mike Fisher would replace Weber as the sixth captain of the club.
